entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Summerside

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 04:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
